_sText: zm_natalyas_ship_v2a ATTENTION: I have released an updated version of this map. Please go download it instead: zm_natalyas_ship_v3 This is the second version. I made this version because there were a number of minor problems with the first version, and, most importantly, the boat did not work properly. In This Version: 48 Spawns (4 Areas) Cubemaps Radar Map HDR Lighting 2 Drivable Boats Video of the Map Modified Secret New Camping Spots sv_turbophysics 0 New Crate Skins Because of the two 100% functional drivable boats I had to have a point_servercommand set sv_turbophysics to 0. This causes a number of problems involving barricades... Zombies can no longer pull on objects, but can walk into them and push them that way. This is not conducive to barricade play. As such, I updated the map with some more climbing camping spots and modified a few existing ones for firewalls. The map is now a more difficult map overall, but it will also be a lot more fun. :) Like the older version, this map has custom Cargo Container and Vending Machine skins built in. They only appear on this map and won't over-write any skins you already have. This one has two different cargo container skins from the last one... A 1337 UP container in place of the DHL, and another Umbrella container. There is also a flag skin (The Latvian Flag) and a plasma tv skin. Other notes: -Nav isn't paked with the map. If you want it, get the nav separately here. -The only bug I've seen so far is that a desk doesn't appear in the command portion of the ship. If you have any problems don't hesitate to let me know. As far as I can tell there are no texture packing errors like there were with the previous version, but occasionally someone will say they don't have them so speak up if you don't. Have Fun!! *EDIT* I have added a gameplay video... Shows you how the boats might work on a reload server with !propmenu. There were only 4 or 5 of us playing though... I haven't played on a full server so we've yet to see what that will be like.
